message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer but $150 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay. I'm interested in the product, but I can only go up to $80 right now. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I understand that $150 is a bit steep for you, but $80 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $120.
